73c35918-2ac0-45be-ad7d-9a25ae7438ee:
A missile of magical energy darts forth from your fingertip and strikes its target, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 points of force {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.[LONGSTART]
The missile strikes unerringly, even if the target is in melee combat, so long as it has less than total cover or total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}.[LONGEND]
For every two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} beyond 1st, you gain an additional missile â€“ two at 3rd level, three at 5th, four at 7th, and the maximum of five missiles at 9th level or higher.
3958ca90-5634-43f4-93a7-0ab2a330faa0: Cone of cold creates an area of extreme cold, originating at your hand and extending outward in a cone. It drains heat, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 15d6).
38d4754e-8a88-49e3-9f66-d2be86c0b44a: Shield creates an invisible shield of force that hovers in front of you. It negates magic missile {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} directed at you. The disk also provides a +4 shield {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.[LONGSTART] This bonus applies against {g|Encyclopedia:Incorporeal_Touch_Attack}incorporeal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g}, since it is a force effect. The shield has no armor {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Fail_Chance}arcane spell failure chance{/g}.[LONGEND]
b2315457-602d-4227-8cda-62c33b6dc857:
The target's bones (or exoskeleton) splinter, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 15d6) to the target, which is also exhausted for 1 minute per caster level from the pain and exertion of the transformation.
If the target succeeds at its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g}, it takes half damage and is fatigued rather than exhausted.
cd7cbee9-c66a-44e6-9485-380b7fc7b2f8: You take control of a target living creature's skeleton. A creature has its skeleton rattle within its flesh, causing it grievous harm. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, plus 1d6 additional points of damage per 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
